mapper.select: SELECT user_id, mobile_number, email, authenticator_id, is_verified FROM user WHERE email = #{email} and mobile_number = #{mobile}
SELECT user_id, mobile_number, email, authenticator_id, is_verified FROM user WHERE email = #{email} and is_verified = 1

SELECT password FROM user WHERE email = #{email} and mobile_number = #{mobile}
mapper.insert: INSERT into user (user_id, mobile_number, email, password, authenticator_id, is_verified) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{mobile}, #{email}, #{password}, #{authenticator_id}, #{is_verified})
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, u.mobile_number, u.email, c.has_user_confirmed, (u.user_id = (SELECT group_leader FROM registration_group_for_event WHERE group_id = #{group_id})) AS is_group_leader FROM confirmation_group_for_event c INNER JOIN user u ON u.user_id = c.user_id WHERE c.group_id=#{group_id}
